coded_answer.p: I am writing to you to showexpress my disagreedisappointment aboutwith the musical show 'Over the rainbow.

First, I am very dissapointeddisappointed withabout the starringstar. I went to the musical to see Danny Brook acting and singing, but he didn't appear. Instead of him, there was an unknown actor, who I dislike.
Also, the musical did not start at 19.30, it started forty-five minutes later. That is why, because it finished later, and I arrived late to a basketball matchgame.
Another thing is that there were not any discounts inon the entrance fee.
Finally, the theatre restaurant was closed because it was sundaySunday. It is closed allevery sundaysSundaysSunday,; you have to say itthat.
That is why I will be pleased if you give me my money back.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. That's why I didn't want to tell him that I had failed my natural science final exam. I was worried because if my parents knew that I had failed, before we were on holidaysholiday, they willwould cancelledcancel the trip to Africa.

But, I needneeded to saytell it to someonetell someone about it, so I told it to Pattold Pat about it. The next day, all the class knew about it. I wasn't too worried because if someonessomeone iswas going to see my parents, I would tell them before not talkto talk about the exams.
But, whenthen my mother was talkingtalked withto Pat's mother and she mentioned it, and my mother cancelled the trip to Africa.
It wasn't PatPat's fault, it was my fault because I was the one who failed the exam and, also, I knew that Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets.
